subject: Merry Christmas & Happy Hanukkah
header: It seems that Perl folks are making good use of their holidays, all of those advent calendar articles are showing it :).
I wish you all a very happy 2017, see you all next year.

entries.title: Evozon + Perl = Going Big in 2017
entries.text: We're cooking something big here at the Evozon HQ in Transylvania as we want to grow our Perl team significantly, and also bring in some fresh new  projects. So, if you're looking for a job, or a team to work on your project, get in touch at jobs@evozon.com, or sales@evozon.com. We can't wait to hear from you.
